title: How AI Image Editing is Reshaping the Future of Digital Design
description: Over the past few years, artificial intelligence has become a cornerstone of digital creativity. From automating complex design tasks to generating new visuals from simple text prompts, AI is transforming how artists, designers, and brands approach image editing.  While traditional editing tools required years of experience and a deep understanding of layers, filters, and color […]

title: India's 92% AI adoption rate the highest in Asia Pacific: BCG report
description: India has emerged as the front-runner in the global race to adopt artificial intelligence (AI) at work, with 92 per cent of employees already using the technology. Across the Asia Pacific region, 78 per cent of workers are embracing AI regularly, outpacing the global average of 72 per cent. This growing adoption marks Asia Pacific as the world's leader in workplace AI integration, according to Boston Consulting Group's (BCG) latest report.
content:
New Delhi [India], November 4 (ANI): India has emerged as the front-runner in the global race to adopt artificial intelligence (AI) at work, with 92 per cent of employees already using the technology.

title: Getty Images largely loses landmark UK lawsuit over AI image generator
description: LONDON (Reuters) -Getty Images largely lost its landmark lawsuit against artificial intelligence company Stability AI over its image generator at London's High Court on Tuesday.

title: Global shares trade lower
description: Global shares retreated Tuesday despite the big lift in overseas markets from optimism over artificial intelligence technology, as traders sold shares to lock in recent profits.
content:
TOKYO — Global shares retreated Tuesday despite the big lift in overseas markets from optimism over artificial intelligence technology, as traders sold shares to lock in recent profits.

title: Google Brings AI-Powered Review Summaries To Play Store, Check Latest Updates
description: Google is rolling out a long-anticipated artificial intelligence feature for the Play Store users that will make app review browsing easier. The update, which adds AI-generated review summaries, is aimed at helping Play Store users choose apps more conveniently. According to Android Authority, the feature uses Google's Gemini AI model to make short summaries that are supposed to show the main advantages and disadvantages of an app.

title: Google, OpenAI and Perplexity bet on India to train next generation of AI
description: Artificial intelligence companies racing to expand in India are not just chasing customers, but they are enlisting millions of users to help train AI models for the world.
content:
Artificial intelligence companies racing to expand in India are not just chasing customers — they are enlisting millions of users to help train AI models for the world.

title: Beacon Software raises $250 million to fund 'anti-private equity' AI roll-ups
description: Beacon Software, a holding company that acquires smaller software businesses and uses artificial intelligence to transform them, has raised $250 million to fund its AI roll-up strategy, the company told Reuters.
content:
Nov 4 (Reuters) - Beacon Software, a holding company that acquires smaller software businesses and uses artificial intelligence to transform them, has raised $250 million to fund its AI roll-up strategy, the company told Reuters.
